Class SettingsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.msc.serverbrowser.gui.controllers.implementations.SettingsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewController

    public class SettingsController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewController
    Defines the behaviour of the settings view and manages setting bindings.
    Author:
    Marcel

      • setupCheckBox

        private static void setupCheckBox(javafx.scene.control.CheckBox box,
                                  Property property)
        Does a one way bidning of a CheckBox to a Property. Initially sets the value of the CheckBox acording to the Properties value. As soon as the CheckBox value changes, the Property value will also change.
        Parameters:
        box - th CheckBox
        property - the Property that will be bound to the CheckBox
